      • getPrefix

        public java.lang.String getPrefix()
        Gets the prefix applied before the names of members of this team. Usually a single format code, but may be any text. Note that the prefix is also used to determine the color for the "glowing" effect - see Renderer.getTeamColor.

      • setPrefix

        public void setPrefix​(java.lang.String prefix)
        Sets the prefix applied before the names of members of this team.

      • getSuffix

        public java.lang.String getSuffix()
        Gets the suffix applied after the names of members of this team. Usually a single reset format code, but may be any text.

      • setSuffix

        public void setSuffix​(java.lang.String suffix)
        Sets the suffix applied after the names of members of this team.

      • formatString

        public java.lang.String formatString​(java.lang.String input)
        Formats the given text as a member of this team, using the prefix and suffix.

        formatString 在类中 Team

      • setColor

        public void setColor​(TextFormatting color)
        Sets the color for this team. The team color is used mainly for team kill objectives and team-specific setDisplay usage; it does _not_ affect all situations (for instance, the prefix is used for the glowing effect).

      • getColor

        public TextFormatting getColor()
        Gets the color for this team. The team color is used mainly for team kill objectives and team-specific setDisplay usage; it does _not_ affect all situations (for instance, the prefix is used for the glowing effect).
